data.title: LULU SITS UP AND TAKES NOURISHMENT
data.meta_description: Taronga Park's lioness, Lulu has made a remarkable recovery from her caesarean operation last night. Lulu was able to "sit up" ...
data.text:
this morning and take a

little nourishment.

Leading gynaecological

surgeon, Dr. Cameron Lox-

ton, performed a caesarean

section on Lulu to remove

a stillborn cub.

"Lulu was treated dur

ing the operation in the

same way as a mother in

one of our leading matern-

ity hospitals," chairman

of the Taronga Park Trust

(Sir Edward Halls trom)

said .today.

: "She is very bright and

we have great hopes for

her recovery,"

Sir Edward said that

Lulu's motherhood days

were now over, and she

would be kept as a pet.
